H0.text: The ancient Greek writer Apollonius of Perga wrote on which subject. Astronomy

H1.text: The ancient Greek writer Apollonius of Perga wrote on which subject. Engineering

H2.text: The ancient Greek writer Apollonius of Perga wrote on which subject. Philosophy

H3.text: The ancient Greek writer Apollonius of Perga wrote on which subject. Math

A4.text: Apollonius of Perga was an ancient Greek geometer and astronomer known for his work on conic sections.

A5.text: Apollonius worked on numerous other topics, including astronomy.

A6.text: Apollonius of Perga's eight-volume Conic Sections summarized and greatly extended existing knowledge.

A7.text: Apollonius's study of the properties of these curves made it possible to show that any plane cutting a fixed double cone will produce a conic according to the earlier definition, leading to the definition commonly used today.
